titleStmt.title: SII 12.184: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 184. (A.R. No. 504 of 1926). ŌMĀMPULIYŪR, CHIDAMBARAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE PRAṆAVA-VYĀGHRAPURĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: In this inscription of the 14th year is registered a gift of land as tirunāmattukkāṇi to the temple of Uḍaiyavaṉ Vaḍataḷiu7ḍaiya-Nāyaṉār by Tiruvalañjuḻi-Uḍaiyār Ichchippeṟṟarayar of Aḻiśupākkam, after purchase from a Brahman lady named Āḷappiṟandāḷ-Śāni, wife of Bālāśriyaṉ Tirumāliruñjōlai-Nambi and the daughter of Karuṇākara-Nambi of Perumarudūr in Ulagaḷandaśōḻa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Mēṟkā-nāḍu, a subdivision of Viruda[rājabhayaṅkara]-vaḷanāḍu ‘on the northern bank’. Ulagaḷandaśōḻa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam may be identified with Ōmāmpuliyūr itself.
The date of the record, according to the astronomical details given, is A.D. 1257, March 18, Sunday.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrīḥ . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 10 4Āvatu miṉanāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu prathamaiyum nāyaṟṟukkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aśva
tināḷ vaṭakarai virutarājabhayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu meṟkāṉāṭṭu brahmadeyam śrī Ulakaḷantacoḻaccaturvetimaṅkalattu perumarutūr karuṇākaranampiyai mutukaṇṇāka Uṭaiya Ivar
makaḷ pālāśrīyaṉ tirumāliruñcolainampi brāhmaṇi Āḷappiṟantāḷcāṉi pakkal Uṭaiyār Uṭaiyavaṉ vaṭataḷiUṭaiya nāyaṉārkku tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka Aḻicu
pākkamuṭaiyār tiruvalañcuḻiyuṭaiyār Iccippeṟṟarayar Uṭaiyār tirunāmattu vilai koṇṭu kuṭutta tirucciṟṟampalavatikku meṟku rājentrecoḻavāykkā
lukku teṟkku Iraṇṭāṅkaṇṇāṟṟu muṉṟāñcatirattu vaṭakkaṭaiya nilam Orumāmukkāṇiyum Itan teṉmerkkuc cārpaṭṭappāḻ nilam kāṇi muntirikaiyum
Āka nilam Iraṇṭumā muntirikaiyum Innilattukkuṭalāy kiḻkaraiyil teṟkkaṭaiya maṉaiyil Opātiyum Iccippeṟṟarayar Āticaṇṭecuvaratevar
kaṉmikaḷ perāl koṇṭu kuṭuttār . pramāṇam Eḻutiṉāṉ Ivvūr Ūrkaṇakku muvalūruṭai yāṉ muṉṉūṟṟuppavappiriyaṉ Eḻutteṉṟum Ivarukku mu
tukaṇpaṭṭu viṟṟa perumarutūr karuṇākaranampi Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Aṟivukku Eḻuttiṭṭa Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ kovintaṉ civilliputtūr nampi . kavuṇiyaṉ śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭar . pālāśriyaṉ
tiruveṇkāṭupaṭṭar . pālāśriyaṉ tillaivāḻantaṇa nampi . ciṟukoṭṭaiyūr subrahmaṇyapaṭṭasomaiyājiyār .
Digital edition of SII 12.184 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
